website_summaries.verdict: Lightweight sunscreen features primarily organic ingredients such as cucumber, algae, and strawberry extract.
pros: Cool, fine mist has good coverage and keeps skin hydrated
Infused with antioxidants to keep skin looking youthful
cons: While many like the pina colada scent, some found it too powerful

customer_reviews.title: The star rating takes an unfair hit for price.
customer_reviews.text: I read a ton of 4 star reviews for this product before buying. People seem to downgrade their ratings for the price, and then go on to rave about it. This is a 5 star product. I'm allergic to all the drugstore sunscreens and have been using Cotz - which is a great brand I swear by as well. But I've been missing the convenience of spray on sunscreen. This one is incredible. It is so light and leaves a glowing sheen and lacks the chalky, dry effects of the zinc/titanium oxide creams. Because of the price I treat it like liquid gold. Yes, expensive but sooooo worth it.
customer_reviews.author: berrycreative

customer_reviews.title: The only natural sunscreen I have found that goes on clear
customer_reviews.text: I'm very particular about what I put on my body and this sunscreen came highly recommended for natural healthy ingredients. I took it on our beach vacation where we were outside in the sun all day. This is one of the few natural sunscreens that actually applies super well, goes on clear and easy no white streaks. We applied it every few hours and my very pale husband didn't even get sunburned. My one complaint is the price, but if sun protection without chemicals is a priority then you'll pay the price like I did!
customer_reviews.author: Allison Cowan

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: OMG THIS STUFF IS AMAZING! I bought bc I googled spray that wouldn’t stain and ruin my white swimsuits, but I use with color suits now too. The spray is a fine mist that disburses wide, so you get your whole body (back included!) so easily and quickly. I know it’s pricey, but I swear it lasts twice as long as other sunscreen brand sprays. I only reapply like once in a whole day. Also, I’m sure there’s more ounces than a typical brand, so one can lasts like a week at the beach. AND it smells sooo good.
customer_reviews.author: Md1

customer_reviews.title: This stuff was great. Smells awesome
customer_reviews.text: This stuff was great. Smells awesome, easy application. Recently got back from a trip to Scottsdale, AZ where temperatures soared into the 110's. I am very light skinned with blue eyes and I burn pretty easy. Not with this stuff. I did re-apply it several times throughout the day because I did not want to ruin my trip by being burnt. I feel like people underestimate how much or how often you need to put sunscreen on. I tend to spray and then rub it in or ask my hubby to rub it into my back. I have purchased both the pina colada scent (which is my fav) and the citrus mimosa (close second to pina colada).
customer_reviews.author: YoloHelloKittyLifestyle

customer_reviews.title: Sunscreen for me!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best sunscreen that I have ever come across. I use to dislike wearing sunscreen because of the oily grease feeling. This one doesn’t do that, protected my skin, and best of all it says it’s reef safe!
customer_reviews.author: Dave L.

customer_reviews.title: Works so well, smells so good!
customer_reviews.text: If it's wrong to love a sunscreen, I don't want to be right! This sunscreen smells AMAZING, it sprays on effortlessly, and it keeps me and my 6 year old son protected! We have very pale, Irish skin..and we had no burns this past summer. I reapplied after he went swimming or after he was sweaty and active. It's so easy to spray on, he doesn't mind! Bonus for moms!! Smells like a pina colada. Yum. Highly recommend, worth the $.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hart

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin and hate the smell and feel of sunscreen. I discovered a couple of years ago that this sunscreen worked great for me. It feels sheer and doesn't smell like sunscreen. I usually get the higher spf and will do so next time as this spf didn't provide the protection I needed. I realize it is expensive but it is definitely a quality product and I will continue to buy it for myself.
customer_reviews.author: LB Miles

customer_reviews.title: Everyone wants to use this!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone always steals this sunscreen from me on our family/friend vacations because it smells incredible, feels nice and cool, and it works well! As far as I know, Coola is also a cruelty-free company, which keeps me coming back for more of this. Wish it was a little less expensive; we go through a lot of it in the summer. Bumped down one star for price. Also seems to attract bugs a bit, so perhaps not the best choice for woodland hiking (but great for the beach).
customer_reviews.author: C. Frost

customer_reviews.title: Will not burn with this!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say enough about this sunblock! For the first time I did NOT burn when I went to the beach. I was in direct sun from 12 to 4. I got some color but I did not burn. Previously I used other brands that did nothing for me. This one is a little pricy but I love how well it works! I applied before going out then reapplied halfway through my time in the sun. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Songbird

customer_reviews.title: Smells Good, but Pricey
customer_reviews.text: Smells good and worked but glad I got it online as it was significantly cheaper though still a little pricey for being a sunblock. I can do just as good with a drugstore brand so I probably won't buy it again simply per the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy J.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love this sunscreen, it's the second time I've purchased product. I got my first bottle from my esthetician who is all about organic products and she was spot on with this one! The smell is amazing and no greasy residue that builds up on the skin. I am only giving it 4 stars because of the price. It's definitely a little more $ than that average sunscreen, but I am happy to pay it to have a cleaner sunscreen for my skin!
customer_reviews.author: rooroo

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know about this one. I mean it smells so good and extremely light. My kids loved it when we used it in Florida I believe I should have gotten a higher screen ( 50 instead of 30 ) because my husband end up looking like a red lobster.
customer_reviews.author: Posh

customer_reviews.title: caused a rash
customer_reviews.text: one bottle would't spay. the other caused a bad rash
customer_reviews.author: momofkids

customer_reviews.title: Scent not great!
customer_reviews.text: A little disappointed in the hype about the the pina coloda smell. I can’t hardly smell it.
customer_reviews.author: leonard

customer_reviews.title: Healthy for skin!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my back when I’m in the sun by myself. Convenient and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Karen K Moore

customer_reviews.title: Best. Sunscreen. Ever
customer_reviews.text: My all-time favorite sunscreen. Goes on even, doesn't leave a film, lasts forever. Is a bit pricey, but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: LOVE! it’s expensive but it’s worth it!!! Protected me from the sun wonderfully!
customer_reviews.author: Page

customer_reviews.title: I think I'm allergic to this product
customer_reviews.text: I can't really review this product. I think I might be allergic to it. So, it did not work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley in FL

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: Organic, smells good, protects without that heavy white stain from other mineral products, and just feel overall better about what I’m putting in my skin and into the environment.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Sacchetti

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth it
customer_reviews.text: Very expensive, but worth it. We rarely, if ever, burn when wearing this and sometimes are outside all day and forget to reapply and we are STiLL good!
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: Environment safe.
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend. I love the spray sunscreen - especially for kids. But mostly that this product doesn't hurt the water or kill off the coral reefs.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Schiff

customer_reviews.title: Works Well!
customer_reviews.text: I'm fair-skinned and this worked very well for me while on vacationing in Florida! I will definitely be purchasing again!
customer_reviews.author: Bev

customer_reviews.title: The Best Sunscreen Products - Period
customer_reviews.text: We use to only use La Roche-Posay products until we found the Coola products. They soak in better to your skin, are not greasy, smell great, are organically produced, AND you don't feel like you are wearing a chemical factory on your skin or covered with some lost slime from a coconut grove. Just pick the scent that you think you may like and try it out. The Pina Colada and Citrus Mimosa are our family's favorites. Then combine that with the Vanilla Peppermint lip balm and you are set to go. You will not be disappointed with these products in any way.
customer_reviews.author: B. Haden

customer_reviews.title: Great sunblock!
customer_reviews.text: I live in California & am super diligent about putting on sunscreen everyday. I’m so glad I found this organic brand. It’s easy to use, non-greasy, & smells fantastic! Highly recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: Best sunscreen ever
customer_reviews.text: The best sunscreen I have ever used, and I’m old! Pricey but worth it
customer_reviews.author: Mary B.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great sunscreen. Smells great
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sunscreen. Smells great, applies well. My only complaint is it didn't seem to last long (meaning the can) if you are in and out of water a lot. I was on vacation with my son, so we reapplied a lot to be sure even though it was a "sport" formula (only 2 of us). It is a little on the pricey side, so factor the usage into the purchase and for a week of vacation I would make sure to have at least 2 cans.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy T.

customer_reviews.title: love the smell
customer_reviews.text: the smell was wonderful and didnt leave me feeling sticky
customer_reviews.author: Kris10

customer_reviews.title: Smells great
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really smells great. I am very sensitive to scent and most scented products give me a headache but I can spray this on throughout the day with no problems. It's not too greasy. I only wish it were less expensive as I am so pale I need a boat load of sunscreen to get through the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Myrab

customer_reviews.title: The best out there!
customer_reviews.text: Works awesome only thing I use! I hide it so I don’t have to share! Hey...It’s costly
customer_reviews.author: NCar1

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this sunscreen. I just recently used this on two of my grandchildren that usually get a rash from other sunscreens, no rash after a three day trip to Disney World. The smell is so tropical. Would recommend this sunscreen to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: pamela brower

customer_reviews.title: Works great, smells good
customer_reviews.text: Feels smooth and not sticky at all. Kept me from my usual burn!
customer_reviews.author: DennieJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Suncare
customer_reviews.text: This Sunncare is great, great protection, no greasy or messy and the smell is awesome. The ingredients in this product pose a MODERATE health concern (EWG 4 score)
customer_reviews.author: J O H N

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sunscreen. Will repurchase
customer_reviews.text: Most amazing sunscreen. Smells amazing. Goes on easily. Lasts a long time. No white cast. Expensive but worth it because i don’t think twice about using it.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen McCaffrey

customer_reviews.title: Defective  spayer
customer_reviews.text: The sprayer is defective. I cannot get it to spray or open.!!The product is un returnable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Resulted in burned family.
customer_reviews.text: This product did not work AT ALL. My family all has dark skin, that doesn’t burn easily. We reapplied frequently and everyone burned. Very disappointed and will not purchase this brand again. (I checked the expiration date and it should have been good through 2021).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sprayer broken!
customer_reviews.text: Spray broken- sprayed everywhere. What a mess. Sprayed everywhere. I think this must be a counterfeit.
customer_reviews.author: Jen La

customer_reviews.title: Great sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: This is great sun protection. This is our second purchase and will be our go to for sunscreen.
customer_reviews.author: Freda

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: The smell is great and is excellent protection from the sun. One of the sunscreens my kids actually don’t complain about. It’s that good!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn W

customer_reviews.title: No hives!
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was allergic to all sunscreen until I found Coola. It works great, no hives, and I have a fantastic tan.
customer_reviews.author: BKA

customer_reviews.title: I won't buy any other brand!
customer_reviews.text: I feel like this product is nearly perfect. Nice, subtle scent. Immediate protection from the sun. One nice feature is that the spray isn't loud and startling for my little ones. It's a little spendy but I feel like it's worth the price. It'll be our summer staple for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Stubblefield

customer_reviews.title: We love this sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: We love this sunscreen, just wish that it lasted a little longer for the price. Smell is yummy and you get good coverage with it.
customer_reviews.author: Gsmore

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply, isn't heavy, non-aerosol
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff, makes putting on sunscreen so easy. It doesn't make you smell like sunscreen.
customer_reviews.author: DoveSoup

customer_reviews.title: The spray was broken on two bottles.....
customer_reviews.text: Such a bummer. I had read great things about this product but both bottles the spray top didn't work. We even took them apart to see if we could fix it and it didn't work. Very disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: myscreenname

customer_reviews.title: Love that it keeps your skin soft after a long ...
customer_reviews.text: Love that it keeps your skin soft after a long day in sun. I do wish they could find a way to make this less expensive without jeopardizing quality. Also miss the mimosa. Pints coolada smell is nice for beach but too strong for boat or tourist shopping.
customer_reviews.author: Love-good-design

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product works well, we didn't burn, I do wish there was an improvement in the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Nelly E. Oberti

customer_reviews.title: The best sunscreen I have used
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this product!It was delivered on time as promised
customer_reviews.author: JACQUELINE

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for all ages!
customer_reviews.text: An outstanding line of skincare products to protect my family from the sun. Creamy, easy to apply, and natural. Works for all ages.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Kurkjian

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Effective yet not greasy or "white." I originally bought this product at a spa and am now a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Marie-Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: THE ROLLS ROYCE OF SUNBLOCK:)
customer_reviews.text: Truly the best sunscreen on the market!!! YOU WILL NEVER BURN AGAIN!!!!!! It's the only sunblock I will buy for my family:)
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: My favorite for summer.
customer_reviews.text: My favorite. Pleasant not chemical smell with no gross residue. Love coola!
customer_reviews.author: T. Sundstrom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love this SPF it worked great! Soaked in quick, wasn't greasy at all, and I never got burnt when I went to Mexico.
customer_reviews.author: H. Courtney

customer_reviews.title: This worked great. A week in Hawaii and no sunburn
customer_reviews.text: This worked great. A week in Hawaii and no sunburn. Wish it was a little more affordable though as it's too expensive for every day use.
customer_reviews.author: E. Overall

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love Coola!!! Best sunscreen out there. Great protection and smells nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Lea B

customer_reviews.title: My favorite sunscreen ever!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite sunscreen ever!!! It's mineral so it works if you put it on and go outside right away. No wait time needed. Plus I have very sensitive skin and Coola is more than kind to my cranky skin. I've tried the lotion before but I like the spray much better. It comes unscented but I like the Piña Colada. It is a very light, beachy smell which does not overwhelm in the slightest. I want to add that this spray leaves no white cast. Just spray it on and you're good to go right away!
customer_reviews.author: DuckyEMTP

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is a plant based product and doesn't leave you feeling greasy.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Ryan-Bohuslavizki

customer_reviews.title: Pale, sensitive distance runner approved
customer_reviews.text: This smells like actual pina coladas when you spray it. I have not burned since I began using this (TWO COATS!), which is all I want. It doesn't irritate my skin or eyes. Lasts through Georgia summer long runs. Feels like nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Willa Ladislaw

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: Best sunscreen ever! I am very fair-skinned and I did not burn at all. I had no allergic reaction. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: L2V

customer_reviews.title: Love this suncreen
customer_reviews.text: The best sunscreen. I never get a sun burn when I use it and it smells so good!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: After finding I am allergic to conventional sunscreen, I have thrived many different organic brands. This is the best organic sunscreen I have found so far. It smells amazing. Many other organic brands are thick and stay very white. This goes on clear.
customer_reviews.author: MBM

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I love the mat face spray a lot I wish the body spray wasn't so oily.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Toliver

customer_reviews.title: 5 days in Cancun with no hint of sunburn.
customer_reviews.text: Effective and easy to apply - plus there are no harsh chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: love that I dont feel like am spraying chemicals all ...
customer_reviews.text: Never use anything else again...love that I dont feel like am spraying chemicals all over me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: By far my favorite sunscreen on the market
customer_reviews.text: By far my favorite sunscreen on the market. It smells delicious while offering great protection. I am fair skinned and have always been pleased with the protection offered by this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: In LOVE with this spray
customer_reviews.text: In LOVE with this spray. I have searched high and low for a sunscreen that is non-toxic, scored low on EWG scale of chemicals and was a spray. This stuff fits the bill and smells delicious at the same time. My 2 year old will not take the time to let me rub him down with lotion so spray is the way to go! I have already purchased additional bottles to have on hand when they run out. It's that good!
customer_reviews.author: SRE

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smells great and stays on well even w/ vigorous exercise!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great product but.....
customer_reviews.text: Love the sunscreen, but feel the cost is to high. Won't buy it again unless it's on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Button

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The smell is great and the coverage in the sun is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sunscreen, over 70% organic, works great for the entire family and no skin irritations. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sw

customer_reviews.title: I love this sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: I have lots of allergies to chemicals and most sunscreen. Finding a spray has taken years but I love this one! Easy to apply, covers well and I've never burned using it. Also smells great. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing and doesn't leave a greasy finish. This is pricy but well worth it in my book!
customer_reviews.author: 2DogNight

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Loved the smell! Great product that doesn't leave white residue.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, good sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: Great product, but overall these spray on sun protectors do not last as much as the regular ones, so the price per quantity is quite steep. Other than that we like all scents. Will likely not buy again, though.
customer_reviews.author: H&C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the best sunscreen ever! I've already gone through 4 bottles this summer! Light and excellent scent!
customer_reviews.author: Liz Sal

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Used an entire bottle of this during my week in the Turks and Caicos. It smells great, sprays evenly and most important protected my very fair skin. No burns!
customer_reviews.author: Pugzimon

customer_reviews.title: Not great sun protection
customer_reviews.text: Applied per instructions on the bottle and still got burned. Ended up buying another sunscreen while on vacation that worked much better!
customer_reviews.author: Shawna Salo

customer_reviews.title: Not what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: I love Coola suncare & I am a huge fan of it, I typically order it from amazon but I am super disappointed as I did not get what I ordered. Amazon CS was super helpful but it’s a bummer that I did not get what I had ordered
customer_reviews.author: Courtney S.

customer_reviews.title: As a sunblock it's great but for the price you don't much
customer_reviews.text: As a sunblock it's great but for the price you don't much. It was empty in less than a week, just using it in the morning before sending my daughter off to camp.
customer_reviews.author: J K

customer_reviews.title: Smells great
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Smell is very pleasant. I bought this because I apply sunscreen religiously and my boyfriend hates the smell of sunscreen. Definitely would buy again. Wish it came in SPF 50
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Altmann

customer_reviews.title: Smells great but too expensive!!
customer_reviews.text: This product did what it said it would do, provide sun protection without all the chemicals. But wow is it expensive!!! In the summer we go through 3-4 bottles of sunblock, not sure I want to keep forking over the $$$ for this. Will be searching for a similar product for less $$$.
customer_reviews.author: Amy R

customer_reviews.title: pricey!
customer_reviews.text: a product that states organic ingredients but uses chemical sunscreens that are not reef safe!
customer_reviews.author: UMA

customer_reviews.title: don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: does not smell that great and does not last. I was looking for a nice scent that worked well. the scent is gone quickly and not that great as described. teh spray needs to be reapplied. you should/could would use a can in a weekend at the beach. pretty costly.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M. Miller

customer_reviews.title: What an annoying product. One has to really squeeze hard to ...
customer_reviews.text: What an annoying product. One has to really squeeze hard to get any spray to come out and fluid is leaking out from under the white plastic collar beneath the nozzle. And this crap expensive, besides.
customer_reviews.author: Richard S.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: There is an expiration date of 2/15 on the bottom of the can - that was one month ago. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: b

customer_reviews.title: Off the organic mark
customer_reviews.text: Coola speay goes on and smells great, but after learning more about the harmful effects of aerosol sunscreens and fragrance, this one is not with the organic price tag.
customer_reviews.author: kpgirl

customer_reviews.title: Mixed Up Product Order!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 3 pina colada spf30 sunscreens - rec'd only one! And 2 wrong ones with spf15. This is for my bosses trip aboard his 130' yacht in bahamas! Had no time to get correct sunscreen before sailing out! Thanks. Now my billionaire bosses wife will be very unhappy with me for not getting her correct sunscreen :-((((
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie L Roach

customer_reviews.text: A little expensive. I used this about 6-7 times and it ran out. I did notice it leaked a bit around the cap :( so some of my product was not used :/ but I have sensitive skin and I had no problem with this! :)
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great protection - unique smell
customer_reviews.text: I will say that I was hesitant about purchasing an expensive organic sunscreen. Typically organic means that it is either opaque white on contact or that it doesn't work- this wasn't the case. I'm pale as a sheet and this stuff kept me extra protected on my trip to Mexico in and out of the ocean and pool water. As for the smell- it does smells exactly like a pina colada- including the excessive alcohol.
customer_reviews.author: jmad_28

product_meta.title: COOLA Organic Body Sunscreen Spray, Broad Spectrum SPF 30, Reef-Safe, Piña Colada, 5 Fl Oz
product_meta.description:
A spray that slays! Our Eco-Lux size organic Sport SPF 30 Continuous Sunscreen Sprays have your back—and every other inch of your skin—with a bottle that keeps misting even when it's upside down, making it easy to cover your entire body. This sheer, water- and sweat-resistant organic formula is packed with antioxidants and skin-nourishing ingredients, and absorbs fast with no greasy feel. So you can play hard without any slippery residue.

1
At COOLA, we're passionate about creating happy, healthy lifestyle experiences. We believe that clean beauty should feel as good as it is healthy, which is why we develop organic products that you'll love wearing every day.
